name: OwnedUpgradeabilityProxy
description: OwnedUpgradeabilityProxy. This contract combines an upgradeability proxy with basic authorization control functionalities.

eventDecorators.name: ProxyOwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event to show ownership has been transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: previousOwner
parameterDecorators.description: representing the address of the previous owner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: representing the address of the new owner.

functionDecorators.name: implementation
functionDecorators.description: Tells the address of the current implementation.

functionDecorators.name: transferProxyOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

functionDecorators.name: upgradeTo
functionDecorators.description: Allows the upgradeability owner to upgrade the current version of the proxy.

parameterDecorators.name: version
parameterDecorators.description: representing the version name of the new implementation to be set.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: representing the address of the new implementation to be set.

functionDecorators.name: upgradeToAndCall
functionDecorators.description: Allows the upgradeability owner to upgrade the current version of the proxy and call the new implementation to initialize whatever is needed through a low level call.

parameterDecorators.name: version
parameterDecorators.description: representing the version name of the new implementation to be set.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: representing the address of the new implementation to be set.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: represents the msg.data to bet sent in the low level call. This parameter may include the function signature of the implementation to be called with the needed payload.

functionDecorators.name: upgradeabilityOwner
functionDecorators.description: Tells the address of the owner.

functionDecorators.name: version
functionDecorators.description: Tells the version name of the current implementation.

returnDecorators.name: version
returnDecorators.description: uint256 representing the name of the current version.
